column4: Crazy question: I have an install iso. I don't have an external cd or any thumb drives on me, but I have a usb hard drive. Can I somehow write the iso to the hard drive in a way that's bootable?
yes, following a tutorial for a USB memory stick will also work for a USB hard drive
I'm bummed you said that. I tried using unetbootin to do it, and it did not work.
